metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24972 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: The Kleopatra component before 3.1.12 (and before 20.07.80) for GnuPG allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code because openpgp4fpr: URLs are supported without safe handling of command-line options. The Qt platformpluginpath command-line option can be used to load an arbitrary DLL.

criterions.comment: kleopatra package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
